knimeNode.name: Molecule Widget
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format.

intro.p: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format. The molecule can also be sketched or its string representation be edited in a widget (KNIME WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: AA descriptive label that will be shown in the view.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the view, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
The format of the molecule string. Please note that not all molecule sketchers support all formats.
The value that is selected by default.
If this is selected, the SMILES/SMARTS/HELM formats cannot be selected from the format list. This is useful, as the ketcher sketcher cannot display those formats.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
